source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_SEQ_00<tab>J'dyalani is not yet ready to give up on Baut.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_SEQ_00<tab>アラギリのジャ・ヤーラニは、バウトの自決を止めるために冒険者の力を貸してほしいようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_SEQ_01<tab>Not wishing to waste time, J'dyalani rushes off to the location described in Baut's note─northwest on the path to the Fringes.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_SEQ_01<tab>ジャ・ヤーラニから、バウトの自決を止めるために力を貸すよう頼まれた。ギラバニア山岳地帯のワイトロックで「バウト」を探そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_SEQ_02<tab>A pantera was preparing to rend the life from its willing victim just as you arrived. Your battle with the beast quickly ensues, and after a furious clash of claws and steel, it is at last brought low. With a sigh of relief you help Baut to his feet.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_SEQ_02<tab>バウトを襲っていた獣を討伐した。ワイトロックの「バウト」を救助しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_SEQ_03<tab>Baut is less than pleased that you intervened, and your bringing J'dyalani does little to ease his frustration. When you explain that the Alliance had no intentions of executing him, he scoffs at their offer of clemency, claiming he would find another way to end his life. J'dyalani pleads with him to reconsider, reminding him that the people of Ala Ghiri care a great deal about him. As he continues to lament that he has nothing left to live for, she surprises him with what sounds oddly like a profession of love. Baut is so taken aback he can only laugh in response. The mood now lightened, he concedes to your requests and agrees to speak with the Alliance, granted J'dyalani helps him explain to the villagers he will not be put to death. As you all return to Ala Ghiri, you decide to pay a visit to Brazen Brook to share with him the good news.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_SEQ_03<tab>バウトにこれまでのすれ違いを説明すると、彼は自分が死にたかっただけだと明かした。だが、ジャ・ヤーラニの言葉に、彼は自決を思いとどまり、解放軍に投降することを決めた。アラギリの「ブレイゼン・ブルック」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_SEQ_04<tab>Brazen Brook is equal parts relieved and ecstatic to see that Baut has agreed to turn himself in. Moreover, the people of Ala Ghiri have not taken arms against the Allied forces in protest. He suspects there is still lingering mistrust of the Resistance and Eorzean Alliance, but he believes that, given time, Ala Ghiri will prosper as it once did so many years ago.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_SEQ_04<tab>ブレイゼン・ブルックに報告した。穏便にバウトが投降できたのは冒険者のおかげだと、彼は感謝した。バウトのようにアラギリの今を大切にしていきたいという、ブレイゼン・ブルックがいれば、この街の未来も大丈夫だろう。
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_TODO_02<tab>ブレイゼン・ブルックに報告

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_000<tab>We can't let him go through with this, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_000<tab>早くバウトさまを見つけて、
自決を思い止まっていただかなくては！
冒険者さま、力をお貸しください！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_001<tab>It looks like he's heading northwest, toward the Fringes. I pray we're not too late.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_001<tab>書き置きに記された自決場所は、アラギリの北西、
辺境地帯へ向かう道すがらでした。
急いで向かいましょう！

TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_002<tab>ああ！　冒険者さま、お助けください！
バウトさまが、私を助けるために……！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BAUT_000_010<tab>I suppose this is where I'm supposed to thank you for saving my life.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BAUT_000_010<tab>……ガイウス閣下を討ち取った冒険者は、伊達じゃねェか。
これから死のうってのに、助けてもらって礼を言うのも、
なんだか変な話だが、ともかくありがとよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_011<tab>Baut, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Thank goodness you're both unharmed.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_011<tab>ああ、バウトさま、冒険者さま！
ご無事でなによりですわ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BAUT_000_012<tab>Why in the hells did you bring <var 1A 02 /var>her<var 1A 01 /var> here?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BAUT_000_012<tab>お、おう……そっちも無事そうでよかった。
えーっとだな、それで……。
お前ら、なんでここに来た？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BAUT_000_013<tab>Hmph! Cowards, the lot of them! They would waste the chance to make an example of me.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BAUT_000_013<tab>そうか……処刑されることはないだろう、か……。
解放軍もずいぶんと甘ちゃんだな。
俺っちの命だって、人気取りに使えるだろうに。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_014<tab>This is all our fault. If we hadn't shown such aggression to the Allied forces, they would have likely made their intentions clear ages ago.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_014<tab>申し訳ありません、バウトさま。
私たちが空回りをして、匿ったばかりに、
無駄に事態を混乱させてしまいました……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BAUT_000_015<tab>You needn't apologize. If I had known they wouldn't kill me, I would have merely sought another way to death's door.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BAUT_000_015<tab>謝る必要はねェよ。
正直、解放軍の意向なんて関係ないんだ。
俺っちが死にたかった、それだけなんだからさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_016<tab>But why!? You have so much to live for!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_016<tab>何故ですか！？
あなたが死ぬ理由は、なにもないはずです！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BAUT_000_017<tab>I have nothing! What is a man without his family? A soldier without his men? I've stained my hands with the blood of so many innocents, and for what?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BAUT_000_017<tab>家族のために手を汚してきた俺っちだから、
家族が死んで、「今」のない空っぽになった。
それでも、部下や任務のために生きてきたが、もう用済みだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_018<tab>You still have Ala Ghiri! It would have been all too easy to stand by and watch as the soldiers taunted and tormented us, yet you chose to show us mercy.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_018<tab>それでは……なぜ私たちを助けてくださったのですか？
空っぽの人ならば、仲間である帝国兵の行為を、
ただ見ているだけだったはずです！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_020<tab>After all the good you've done here, are we not worth living for? Am <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> not worth living for?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_020<tab>私たちは、あなたの「今」ではなかったのですか？
……ううん、こういう質問は卑怯ですね。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_021<tab>I know I can never replace your family. I would never try. But I'd like to try and make you happy, if you'll let me.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_021<tab>私を、あなたの生きる意味に……家族にしてもらえませんか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_023<tab>Has this obsession with loss truly made you so blind? The people of Ala Ghiri care about you, none more so than me. You brought light and hope back into our lives, and I would return that kindness a hundredfold if I can.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_023<tab>アラギリに留まり、帝国兵の暴虐から救ってくださった。
私たちの今を、その行動で認めてくださった。
そんなあなたの生きる意味に、私はなりたいのです。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BAUT_000_024<tab>Yes, by all means. Let's get married, settle down here in the village, and fill our cottage with the pitter-patter of little feet.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BAUT_000_024<tab>……ったく、生きる意味になりたいとか、家族にしてくれとか、
まるで求婚してるみたいじゃないか。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_025<tab>Marriage!? I-I didn't mean to─that's not to say I'm opposed to... Oh dear, this is all so sudden.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_JDYALANI_000_025<tab>あ、いや、そんなつもりじゃ！？
いえ、嫌いとか、イヤとかではなく、
むしろ望むところと申しましょうか、その……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BAUT_000_026<tab>Before you let your imagination run wild, there's still the matter of my surrender to the Allied forces. I'm going to need your help in assuring the others that I won't be put to death.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BAUT_000_026<tab>それじゃあ、アラギリに帰って、解放軍に投降するか！
その後どうするかなんて、まったく考えてねェけど、
一緒に考えてくれるだろ？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BAUT_000_028<tab>I suppose this is it. I know not what they have in store for me, but I will at last atone for my crimes. When they release me, well...it seems I have something worth waiting for. Thank you, for everything.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BAUT_000_028<tab>冒険者、手間ァかけちまったな。
「ブレイゼン」殿には、そっちからも報告、頼むわ。
……ありがとよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BRAZENBROOK_000_030<tab>There <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is, the hero of the hour! I don't know how you did it, but J'dyalani returned just now with Baut in tow. He says he's ready to turn himself in!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BRAZENBROOK_000_030<tab>冒険者殿、感謝いたしますぞ！
ジャ・ヤーラニ殿に連れられて、バウト殿が投降しました！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BRAZENBROOK_000_031<tab>What's more, public reaction to his surrender's been surprisingly calm. The last thing we need is to be fendin' off the people we came to save.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BRAZENBROOK_000_031<tab>アラギリの方々も、納得してくださったとのことで、
いやはや私も一安心です。
同胞と争うなど、髑髏連隊だけで十分ですからな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BRAZENBROOK_000_032<tab>If you hadn't shown up when you did, I'm sure they'd be chasin' us out of here with pitchforks and torches by now.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BRAZENBROOK_000_032<tab>これも、冒険者殿のおかげです。
貴殿がいなかったら、我々はすれ違ったまま、
破局を迎えていたでしょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BRAZENBROOK_000_033<tab>To make sure they don't, we'll all be takin' a leaf out of Baut's book in building better relations with the townsfolk. It'll take some work, to be sure, but we'll get this place back to the way it used to be.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ817_02845_BRAZENBROOK_000_033<tab>しかし、バウト殿は本当に素晴らしい。
帝国兵でありながら、アラギリの方の心をこれほど掴むとは。
私もあの方を見習い、この街の今を大切にしませんとな！
